content:
Hello! I am a final year undergraduate at UC San Diego majoring in Computer Science with a minor in Math. My research interests are in embodied AI and robot learning, and I do some extracurricular robot building at Triton Droids.
If you are interested in collaborating or want to chat, feel free to reach out via email! Otherwise do check out some of my very early attempts at blog-post writing below.
At a Glance Research 11 January 2026·12 words·1 min Papers, lab work, and research projects. Projects 11 January 2026·18 words·1 min Hands-on builds and engineering work (with write-ups, results, and links). Writing 11 January 2026·11 words·1 min Blog posts, experiment notes, and explainers.
summary:
Hello! I am a final year undergraduate at UC San Diego majoring in Computer Science with a minor in Math. My research interests are in embodied AI and robot learning, and I do some extracurricular robot building at Triton Droids.
If you are interested in collaborating or want to chat, feel free to reach out via email! Otherwise do check out some of my very early attempts at blog-post writing below.
title: Home

title: Writing

content:
What I work on # I build learning systems for dexterous manipulation and humanoid control, especially where morphology matters and deployment constraints are real.
How I like to work # Own the stack end-to-end (sim -> learning -> eval -> deployment) Build reproducible training pipelines and measurable ablations Keep notes and checklists so future experiments run faster Interests # Morphology-conditioned control Sim-to-real and robustness Online learning / adaptation Systems for large-scale RL training
